short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides posts on teamfortress.tv

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to hide the content of posts on teamfortress.tv. The user can define a blacklist of teamfortress.tv users by username and the contents of all their posts on the forums will be replaced with "Hidden by the "Hide tftv posts" chrome extension".
